extendedInfo.description: Mobo Video Player Pro, the best video player"Video!Video!Video!" will play an important role in your phone's use. Mobo Video Player Pro is the best Video Player in android market to help to play video in your phone and it is totally freeï¼We ensure you will love this video player after using it.If you are pursuing a video player with the better user experience and user interfaceï¼Mobo Video Player Pro will be your ultimate choice. Mobo Video Player Pro is the video player supports all the most popular video formats without any conversion. Its smart core technology auto detects video formats and makes it much easier for you to enjoy smoother, better quality videos.It scans your phone's videos and makes you easier to manage the videos. It keeps your video playing progress and resume video's previous progress. It now can hide the videos from the video file list and keep your videos private. Do you have secret videos such as sexy girl or sex videos on your phone that your don't want others to see? The "Hide Video" feature will meet your request.Mobo Video Player Pro supports such videos as followsï¼1.All video formats2.Supports SRT, SMI plug-in subtitle and MKV embedded subtitle videos.3.Multi-audio streams and multi-subtitles videos4.Playlists and continuous play 5.Advanced media libraries and sort videos by type 6.Thumbnail displays of videos7.Supports flash formats video - swf, flv videos8.HD video playing memory optimization9.Playing gesture10.Codec PluginMobo Video Player Pro dynamically linked to FFmpeg shared video decoding library, which was compiled to contain LGPL decoders and splitters only. Source codes can be downloaded from this website:http://code.google.com/p/best-video-player/source/checkoutMobo Video Player Pro is the pro version of Mobo Video Player. It has the new codec-plugin structure, add the playing memory optimization feature to ensure your playing more smoothy, add the playing gesture feature and improve the user experience.KW:best video player pro audio media movie player ffmpeg mobo best player hide video vplayer MP4 3GP MKV MOV WMV MPEG show moboplayer flash player poweramp rockplayer mVideoPlayer MX Video Player qqplayer mobo video player pro

reviews.title: Very well yet  simple to use app.
reviews.comment: I was having a hard time looking for a player like this one, that pretty much has everything you need. to proceed with this part of all your vids. & movies etc. Thank you, Mono. That\'s gotta be 5 stars in my book.
reviews.author: Jim Fimbrez

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: The add is annoying. To remove add have to earn coin by installing some craps. HD video is playing like slow motion videos on high end phones. The mx player is great app. So think before install this app.
reviews.author: sunil raj

reviews.title: Great app needs more features
reviews.comment: Auto rotation, slow motion, ab repeat, and pan and zoom.... then it would be the perfect app, but it has the hide feature... which is awesome
reviews.author: Andrew Frank

reviews.title: Slow video and shutsoff after every video
reviews.comment: I tried using this to play my 808 keychain cam videos in .mov format and it is very slow even after optmizing and aftere each video the app closes.
reviews.author: Kris Dillard

reviews.title: Crashes om Galaxy 4S -hate ads
reviews.comment: Constantly crashes on my 4S. A pro version full of ads? Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Ronald Pacheco

reviews.title: Garbage... Don\'t bother.
reviews.comment: Downloaded.... Tried to start   crash.... Restart... Didn\'t load my library and started trying to sell me crap...  UNINSTALL
reviews.author: Austin Brown

reviews.title: Not compatible with Nexus 7
reviews.comment: It kept crashing on mine. Also what is the deal with the background of the chick that I can\'t change?
reviews.author: Francesca Cimino

reviews.title: Good but....
reviews.comment: While I\'m watching my video I have to keep touching the screen to keep the back light on because it doesn\'t let your phone know that you\'re watching a video.
reviews.author: 42Keez

reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.comment: Annoying ads... And after installation it changed my SGS4 display timeout to a very low time (a few seconds). Waste of time! Not recommended!
reviews.author: Paulo Oliveira

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: Mx video player are much better for me.I am using Sony xperia ray ICS . Its too much lagging when playing hd videos
reviews.author: SUDIP BISWAS

reviews.title: Fix ur app
reviews.comment: Crashed 3 times for 30 secs but not before asking me to pay for it... Go fix it before selling...

reviews.title: Warning!!
reviews.comment: I installed this app......It gave a warning 2 download codecs and even when I downloaded codecs it still give warnings to download codecs and doesn\'t work.....a total crap
reviews.author: Jai Joshi

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Constantly crashing and too many pop up ads. Couldn\'t even see one video.
reviews.author: Jos\303\251 Esteras

reviews.title: Crashes my nexus
reviews.comment: Just downloaded this and it is the only app I\'ve ever used that caused my tablet to crash. Hasn\'t run even once correctly!
reviews.author: Chris Bartlo

reviews.title: Apps ruin it
reviews.comment: Adverts in form of \'updates\' on status bar! Don\'t bother with this app!
reviews.author: Elwyn York

reviews.title: Other video players don\'t spam you
reviews.comment: Its a good player, but the constant spamming about batteries pushed me over the top.  I get having ads in the player, I do, but to push me the same message day after day some on now.  Plenty of other players in the market to not have to deal with constant spam.
reviews.author: Mark Cassara

reviews.title: rubbish rubbish rubbish
reviews.comment: when i opened it first time it asked me to download its codec,i downloaded it,then again while opening it ,it asks me again to go to market to download its codec. really rubbish.fed up.fix it
reviews.author: siddhesh kondurkar

reviews.title: Ads ads ads
reviews.comment: Did not even bother to play a video, all I saw was crash reports and full page ads
reviews.author: Bj\303\266rn Zachrisson

reviews.title: Very unstable !
reviews.comment: On a Google Nexus 7 I couldn\'t even start it. All it does is error out. Even then it was trying to lead to all sorts of ads. Absolute waste of time.
reviews.author: Jonathan Padua

reviews.title: It used to be great. Please upgrade it
reviews.comment: It does not work with Samsung Galaxy S4.  I\'ve used this app for quite a bit of time with HTC phones without any issues and truly enjoyed it. Now it crashes my phone. I\'ll have to un install until this is fixed.  I hope you can fix this.
reviews.author: A Google User
